message: Route 40 diverted. Stops: LAUDERDALE ST@DISON AVE, LAUDERDALE ST@ESSEX AVE, LAUDERDALE ST@WALDORF AVE, WALDORF AVE@SHADOWLAWN BLVD, WALDORF AVE@CAMERON ST, WALDORF AVE@PRESTON ST, WALDORF AVE@LATHAM ST, will not be served.
The Trolley units will not begin running  on Saturday December 2, 2023 until the St. Jude Marathon has ended.
Route 8 Delayed at Rhodes and Getwell @ 9:10 pm
